## PRISMA-S Checklist for chapter {{< var chapters.synthesis >}} {.appendix}

| Item                          | No. | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | Location                                            |
|------------------|------------------|-------------------|-------------------|
| Database name                 | 1   | Name each individual database searched, stating the platform for each.                                                                                                                                                                                             | Appendix {{< var appendix.search >}}                |
| Multi-database searching      | 2   | If databases were searched simultaneously on a single platform, state the name of the platform, listing all of the databases searched.                                                                                                                             | Appendix {{< var appendix.search >}}                |
| Study registries              | 3   | List any study registries searched.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Appendix {{< var appendix.search >}}                |
| Online resources and browsing | 4   | Describe any online or print source purposefully searched or browsed (e.g., tables of contents, print conference proceedings, web sites), and how this was done.                                                                                                   | Appendix {{< var appendix.search >}}                |
| Citation searching            | 5   | Indicate whether cited references or citing references were examined, and describe any methods used for locating cited/citing references (e.g., browsing reference lists, using a citation index, setting up email alerts for references citing included studies). | See Methods, Approach to searching and data sources |
| Contacts                      | 6   | Indicate whether additional studies or data were sought by contacting authors, experts, manufacturers, or others.                                                                                                                                                  | See Methods, Approach to searching and data sources |
| Other methods                 | 7   | Describe any additional information sources or search methods used.                                                                                                                                                                                                | No other methods                                    |
| Full search strategies        | 8   | Include the search strategies for each database and information source, copied and pasted exactly as run.                                                                                                                                                          | Appendix {{< var appendix.search >}}                |
| Limits and restrictions       | 9   | Specify that no limits were used, or describe any limits or restrictions applied to a search (e.g., date or time period, language, study design) and provide justification for their use.                                                                          | See Methods, Inclusions and exclusion criteria.     |
| Search filters                | 10  | Indicate whether published search filters were used (as originally designed or modified), and if so, cite the filter(s) used.                                                                                                                                      | See Methods, Electronic search strategy             |
| Prior work                    | 11  | Indicate when search strategies from other literature reviews were adapted or reused for a substantive part or all of the search, citing the previous review(s).                                                                                                   | See Methods, Electronic search strategy             |
| Updates                       | 12  | Report the methods used to update the search(es) (e.g., rerunning searches, email alerts).                                                                                                                                                                         | No update done.                                     |
| Dates of searches             | 13  | For each search strategy, provide the date when the last search occurred.                                                                                                                                                                                          | See Methods, @tbl-info-sources                      |
| Peer review                   | 14  | Describe any search peer review process.                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | See Methods, Electronic Search Strategy             |
| Total records                 | 15  | Document the total number of records identified from each database and other information sources.                                                                                                                                                                  | See Results, @fig-prisma-flow-diagram               |
| Deduplication                 | 16  | Describe the processes and any software used to deduplicate records from multiple database searches and other information sources.                                                                                                                                 | See Methods @tbl-info-sources                       |
